title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.9 - Sale of foods in damaged containers to a licensed food salvager
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.9 - Sale of foods in damaged containers to a licensed food salvager

State Regulations

Agriculture and Markets Law, ยง 18(2) and (6)

Food or food products in containers that have been damaged
as a result of fire, flood, accident, industrial mishandling, or other cause
may be sold to a licensed food salvager for segregation and
reconditioning. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
256.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
